thread.title: BRIEF-American Airlines Group Reports Q1 EPS $0.39

title: BRIEF-American Airlines Group Reports Q1 EPS $0.39
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - American Airlines Group Inc:
* AMERICAN AIRLINES GROUP REPORTS FIRST-QUARTER 2018 PROFIT
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.39 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.72 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $5.00 TO $6.00 EXCLUDING ITEMS
* Q1 REVENUE $10.4 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $10.42 BILLION
* QTRLY TOTAL MAINLINE & REGIONAL PASSENGER LOAD FACTOR 80.4 PERCENT VERSUS 79.2 PERCENT
* QTRLY TOTAL MAINLINE & REGIONAL REVENUE PASSENGER MILES (RPM) 52,945 MILLION VERSUS 50,984 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR
* QTRLY TOTAL MAINLINE & REGIONAL PRASM 14.40 CENTS VERSUS 13.98 CENTS
* QTRLY TOTAL MAINLINE & REGIONAL AVAILABLE SEAT MILES (ASM) 65,823 MILLION VERSUS 64,341 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $5.75 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* HIGHER FUEL PRICES LED TO A DECLINE IN YEAR-OVER-YEAR EARNINGS IN QUARTER Source text for Eikon:
